Resmi! Ini Pembagian Tugas Wakil Menteri BUMN
03 Nov 2019, 12:55 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Pradita Utama

Jakarta - Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) Erick Thohir baru saja menetapkan pembagian tugas untuk kedua Wakil Menterinya yakni Budi Gunadi Sadikin dan Kartika Wirjoatmodjo. Pembagian tugas ini Keputusan Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara Nomor: SK-263/MBU/10/2019 tentang Pembagian Badan Usaha Milik Negara yang Dikoordinasikan Wakil Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara.Berdasarkan keterangan resmi Kementerian BUMN, Minggu (3/11/2019), Wamen BUMN I Budi Gunadi Sadikin membina BUMN sektor farmasi, jasa survei, energi, pertambangan, industri strategis, dan media. Sementara, Wamen BUMN II Kartiko Wirjoatmodjoo membina BUMN sektor industri agro, kawasan, logistik, pariwisata, jasa keuangan, konstruksi, jasa konsultan, sarana dan prasarana perhubungan."Hal ini sudah disepakati bersama, sehingga masing-masing Wamen dapat bersinergi dengan baik dan mengakselerasi tugas-tugas yang sudah diberikan," kata Erick Thohir.Erick pun meminta agar para deputi berkoordinasi dengan para wakil menteri sebagaimana tugas yang ditetapkan."Saya juga sudah minta masing-masing Deputi Pembina BUMN agar dapat melakukan koordinasi dan sinkronisasi dengan para Wamen sebagaimana pembagian yang ditetapkan," kata Erick.Untuk diketahui, Erick Thohir dilantik menjadi Menteri BUMN pada 23 Oktober 2019 lalu. Kamudian disusul dengan pelantikan Budi Gunadi Sadikin dan Kartika Wirjoatmodjo sebagai Wakil Menteri BUMN pada 25 Oktober 2019.Sebagaimana disampaikan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) pada tanggal 25 Oktober 2019, masing-masing Wamen mendapatkan penugasan khusus untuk memperkuat kinerja Menteri Kabinet Indonesia Maju.Simak Video "Ini 2 Wamen BUMN Pilihan Jokowi Untuk Bantu Erick Thohir"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)

Official! This is the division of duties of the Deputy Minister of BUMN
03 Nov 2019, 12:55 p.m. by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Pradita Utama

Jakarta - Minister of State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN) Erick Thohir has just established the division of tasks for his two Deputy Ministers namely Budi Gunadi Sadikin and Kartika Wirjoatmodjo. This division of tasks Decree of the Minister of State-Owned Enterprises Number: SK-263 / MBU / 10/2019 concerning the Division of State-Owned Enterprises Coordinated by Deputy Minister of State-Owned Enterprises. Based on the official statement of the Ministry of SOEs, Sunday (3/11/2019), BUMN I Vice Minister Budi Gunadi Sadikin fosters SOEs in the pharmaceutical, surveying, energy, mining, strategic industries and media sectors. Meanwhile, Vice Minister of SOE II Kartiko Wirjoatmodjoo fosters SOEs in the agro, regional, logistics, tourism, financial services, construction, consulting services, transportation facilities and infrastructure sectors. "This has been mutually agreed upon, so that each Vice Minister can work well together and accelerate. tasks that have been given, "said Erick Thohir. Eric also requested that the deputies coordinate with the deputy ministers as assigned." I have also asked each Deputy Guidance of SOEs to be able to coordinate and synchronize with the Vice-Regents as part of the distribution which was determined, "said Erick. For your information, Erick Thohir was appointed Minister of BUMN on October 23, 2019. Kamudian followed by the inauguration of Budi Gunadi Sadikin and Kartika Wirjoatmodjo as Deputy Minister of BUMN on October 25, 2019. As stated by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) on October 25, 2019, each Vice Minister received a special assignment to strengthen the performance of the Indonesian Cabinet Minister Maju.
